help.short: Create the specified compute policy. During update, the compute policy with the specified name will be replaced with this new compute policy. An account supports, at most, 50 policies
Delete the specified compute policy from the specified Data Lake Analytics account
List the Data Lake Analytics compute policies within the specified Data Lake Analytics account. An account supports, at most, 50 policies
Get the specified Data Lake Analytics compute policy.
Update the specified compute policy.
Manage Compute Policy
Create the specified Data Lake Analytics account to include the additional Data Lake Store account.
Delete the Data Lake Analytics account specified to remove the specified Data Lake Store account.
List the first page of Data Lake Store accounts linked to the specified Data Lake Analytics account. The response includes a link to the next page, if any.
Get the specified Data Lake Store account details in the specified Data Lake Analytics account.
Manage Data Lake Store Account
Create the specified firewall rule. During update, the firewall rule with the specified name will be replaced with this new firewall rule.
Delete the specified firewall rule from the specified Data Lake Analytics account
List the Data Lake Analytics firewall rules within the specified Data Lake Analytics account.
Get the specified Data Lake Analytics firewall rule.
Update the specified firewall rule.
Manage Firewall Rule
List the Azure Storage containers, if any, associated with the specified Data Lake Analytics and Azure Storage account combination. The response includes a link to the next page of results, if any.
Gets the SAS token associated with the specified Data Lake Analytics and Azure Storage account and container combination.
Get the specified Azure Storage container associated with the given Data Lake Analytics and Azure Storage accounts.
Manage Container
Create the specified Data Lake Analytics account to add an Azure Storage account.
Delete the specified Data Lake Analytics account to remove an Azure Storage account.
List the first page of Azure Storage accounts, if any, linked to the specified Data Lake Analytics account. The response includes a link to the next page, if any.
Get the specified Azure Storage account linked to the given Data Lake Analytics account.
Update the Data Lake Analytics account to replace Azure Storage blob account details, such as the access key and/or suffix.
Manage Storage Account
Create the specified Data Lake Analytics account. This supplies the user with computation services for Data Lake Analytics workloads.
Delete the delete process for the Data Lake Analytics account object specified by the account name.
List the first page of Data Lake Analytics accounts, if any, within the current subscription. This includes a link to the next page, if any.
Get details of the specified Data Lake Analytics account.
Update the Data Lake Analytics account object specified by the accountName with the contents of the account object.
Manage Account
Get subscription-level properties and limits for Data Lake Analytics specified by resource location.
Manage Capability
Checks whether the specified account name is available or taken.
Manage Data Lake Analytics
